description:
TrayRecentFiles is a KeePass 2.x plugin that lists your recent files directly in the system tray icon menu.

This plug-in will add the (exact) same "Open Recent" menu to your systray KeePass icon.

I believe this is a very useful plugin for people who use more than one KeePass databases on a daily basis (such as me).
summary: Plugin for KeePass 2.x to list your recent files directly on your systray icon
author: Fábio Beirão
